title: VMware security advisory (AV25-196)
description: On April 7, 2025, VMware released security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: VMware Tanzu Greenplum  versions prior to 6.29.0
VMware Tanzu Greenplum Backup and Restore  versions prior to 1.31.0
VMware Tanzu Greenplum Platform Extension Framework  versions prior to 6.11.1
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
